description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

Parkland view, 1-9 Blythwood Road Islington, London, N4 4ER

TPO Reference:

T5 – Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.71) 1986 
G2 – Various species of LBI TPO (No.71) 1986
T10 -- Sycamore of LBI TPO (NO.71) 1986

PO Number:

T090101

Work specifications:

1 x Sycamore (T5) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.71) 1986.
T3 as detailed in the plan supplied
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 4m above ground level
Reduce crown to previous points of reduction.


G2 as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.71) 1986

Sycamores- T6, T7, T8, T10 & T11 as detailed on the plan supplied
Reduce crown to previous points of reduction.
Prune back from the property to give 2m clearance by the removal of sub-lateral branches. 

Hawthorn – T9 as detailed in the plan supplied.
Crown reduce by up to 2m and re shape.

1 x Sycamore (T10) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.71) 1986.
T1 as detailed in the plan supplied.
Crown Reduce by up to 15%.
decision_conditions: The trees labelled T2, T4, T5 in the plan supplied are not currently covered by a Tree Preservation Order and are not protected within a conservation area. As such the planning Authority have no juristiction over these trees and have not commented on the works proposed to them.
